text: hi guys I'm Laura Vitale on this episode
of Laura in the kitchen I'm going to
show you how to make an Italian cioppino
cioppino is really just a seafood soup
really it's an Italian seafood soup and
it's very simple needed to make just
like everything else I make because I
don't have patience for anything that's
difficult or tedious it's a real classic
especially around this time of year
Christmas is right around the corner if
you know about Italian tradition and
you're well aware of the seafood feast
that we have on Christmas Eve also known
as the feast of Seven Fishes but what's
really great about this recipe normally
you're supposed to do seven different
seafood dishes for Christmas Eve now if
you want to make just one make this and
then just put a bunch of seafood in it

course you're gonna need some fish stock
white wine pinch of hot pepper flakes
salt pepper extra virgin olive oil now
for the fish stock if you can't find
that you local grocery store you can do
what I do I just take the peel you know
the skin from the shrimp then once I
clean them take the skin put it in a

minutes or so
